ai-patthana22.19:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
ai-patthana22.19:0.3_0: should apply himself to a joke.
ai-patthana22.19:1.1_0: Neither for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana22.19:2.1_0: Neither nonsensical nor grasping, causes and reasons not to be grasped.
